title: Featured Excerpt: The Rebel Romanov
description: by Helen Rappaport From the New York Times bestselling author of The Romanov Sisters comes the story of a courageous young Imperial Grand Duchess who scandalized Europe in search of freedom. Read on for a featured excerpt from The Rebel Romanov. PROLOGUE  The Coburg Marriage In May 1816, at the Prince Regent’s Carlton House residence in London, an […] The post Featured Excerpt: The Rebel Romanov appeared first on The History Reader.
author: Sara Beth Haring
